name: Xerox Project
description: Performs sales lead generation through Google and LinkedIn using a number of anti-detection scraping techniques and merges the results with existing CRM data which can be then visualized using this UI which relies on the Google Maps API. Example shown is a subset of the total data for companies that fit into 3 chosen industries. This allows the user to plan out their day and prepare what value propositions to focus on selling in a given area when performing B2B cold calling
